title._content: ["The Braes," Herbert Lee Pratt, Glen Cove, New York.  (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["The Braes," Herbert Lee Pratt, Glen Cove, New York. Terrace Garden ornamental pool] [ca. 1918] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House architecture: James Brite, 1912-1914. Landscape: James Leal Greenleaf with James Brite, 1912-1914. Associated Name: Florence Gibb [Mrs. Herbert L.] Pratt. Today: House extant as Webb Institute. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.21927 Call Number: LC-J717-X110- 222
